repos_data.description: There can be more than Notion and Miro. AFFiNE(pronounced [ə‘fain]) is a next-gen knowledge base that brings planning, sorting and creating all together. Privacy first, open-source, customizable and ready to use.
A privacy-first, self-hosted, fully open source personal knowledge management software, written in typescript and golang.

A privacy-first, open-source platform for knowledge management and collaboration. Download link:  http://github.com/logseq/logseq/releases. roadmap: https://discuss.logseq.com/t/logseq-product-roadmap/34267

Langchain-Chatchat（原Langchain-ChatGLM）基于 Langchain 与 ChatGLM, Qwen 与 Llama 等语言模型的 RAG 与 Agent 应用 | Langchain-Chatchat (formerly langchain-ChatGLM), local knowledge based LLM (like ChatGLM, Qwen and Llama) RAG and Agent app with langchain
Build your personal knowledge base with Trilium Notes
Docmost is an open-source collaborative wiki and documentation software. It is an open-source alternative to Confluence and Notion.
Memory layer for AI Agents. Replace complex RAG pipelines with a serverless, single-file memory layer. Give your agents instant retrieval and long-term memory.
Open-source and local-first Slack and Notion alternative that puts you in control of your data
Markdown note-taking web application designed for simplicity

Node.js/TypeScript MCP server for Atlassian Confluence. Provides tools enabling AI systems (LLMs) to list/get spaces & pages (content formatted as Markdown) and search via CQL. Connects AI seamlessly to Confluence knowledge bases using the standard MCP interface.
Convert source code to LLM ready knowledge base
Console client for Evernote. This is the current alive working fork (in 2026)
